data.name: Deck of Ashes - Original Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
A unique and challenging puzzle adventure Tetragon is out now!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1545850/Tetragon/


About the Game

ABOUT THIS CONTENT

All the tracks from Deck of Ashes written by Mark Braga. All songs available with covers, credits and full meta tags.

TRACK LIST

01 Ash Curse
02 Camp Theme
03 Lurking Danger
04 Battle Theme #1
05 Battle Theme #2
06 Battle Theme #3
07 Battle Theme #4
08 Battle Theme #5
09 Battle Theme #6
10 Battle Theme #7
11 No Mercy!

CREDITS

Music composed by Mark Braga.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 Mb capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9 Compatible
